welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Sainte-Anne-des-Plaines, a charming city known for its beautiful parks and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay. Bon voyage!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mirabel Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Mirabel Airport, primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St Hubert Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at St Hubert Airport, handling all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminals.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional and low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A newer terminal for international flights, including US pre-clearance.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
